data.description: At Manulife John Hancock, we believe in investing in the future – starting with you. Our AI Engineering Intern position is your launchpad to success, offering the support, structure, and exciting opportunities you need to thrive and make your mark.Our team is seeking a motivated AI Engineering Intern to join our Asset Management AI team. This internship offers hands‑on experience developing AI‑driven solutions in an investment management context. You will work with market and portfolio data, support data engineering initiatives, and contribute to foundational capabilities that enable scalable use of Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI within our existing MLOps framework.This role is ideal for candidates who are passionate about applied AI, data engineering, and modern cloud‑based ML platforms, and who are eager to learn in a collaborative, real‑world environment.Key ResponsibilitiesCollaboration and Support: Assist front office analysts and portfolio managers in identifying AI/ML opportunities and developing lightweight prototypes.Data Engineering: Help design and implement data models, support automated data mapping, and perform data quality checks.Tooling and Standards: Contribute to defining best practices for MLOps processes and CI/CD workflows.Research and Development: Stay informed about advancements in LLM and Generative AI models and assist in integrating these into our workflows.Cloud and Infrastructure Support: Gain exposure to tools like Databricks, Kubernetes, and Azure Data Factory for ETL and compute tasks.Required QualificationsCurrently pursuing a Master’s or PhD in Financial Engineering, Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related quantitative field.Familiarity with Python and fundamental software development concepts.Strong interest in AI/ML, data engineering, and cloud‑based technologies.Excellent analytical and problem‑solving skills with strong attention to detail.Ability to communicate clearly and collaborate effectively within a team environment.Preferred QualificationsExposure to cloud platforms such as Azure, AWS, or GCP.Experience with data or compute platforms such as Databricks, or containerization tools like Docker and Kubernetes.Familiarity with CI/CD concepts and model or experiment tracking tools (e.g., MLflow).When you join our team:We’ll empower you to learn and grow the career you want. We’ll recognize and support you in a flexible environment where well-being and inclusion are more than just words. As part of our global team, we’ll support you in shaping the future you want to see. As part of our internship program, you will gain early access to Manulife John Hancock’s premier early talent program, GRO, tailored to graduating students! The program designed to launch your career with the support, structure, and opportunities you need to thrive.Please note the salary range is $78,000 USD to $117,000 USD.#LI-Hybrid #LI-JHAbout Manulife and John HancockManulife Financial Corporation is a leading international financial services provider, helping people make their decisions easier and lives better. To learn more about us, visit https://www.manulife.com/en/about/our-story.html.Manulife is an Equal Opportunity EmployerAt Manulife/John Hancock, we embrace our diversity. We strive to attract, develop and retain a workforce that is as diverse as the customers we serve and to foster an inclusive work environment that embraces the strength of cultures and individuals. We are committed to fair recruitment, retention, advancement and compensation, and we administer all of our practices and programs without discrimination on the basis of race, ancestry, place of origin, colour, ethnic origin, citizenship, religion or religious beliefs, creed, sex (including pregnancy and pregnancy-related conditions), sexual orientation, genetic characteristics, veteran status, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, family status, disability, or any other ground protected by applicable law.It is our priority to remove barriers to provide equal access to employment. A Human Resources representative will work with applicants who request a reasonable accommodation during the application process. All information shared during the accommodation request process will be stored and used in a manner that is consistent with applicable laws and Manulife/John Hancock policies. To request a reasonable accommodation in the application process, contact recruitment@manulife.com.Working ArrangementHybridKnow Your Rights I Family & Medical Leave I Employee Polygraph Protection I Right to Work I E-Verify Company: John Hancock Life Insurance Company (U.S.A.)
responsibilities: Collaboration and Support: Assist front office analysts and portfolio managers in identifying AI/ML opportunities and developing lightweight prototypes.
Research and Development: Stay informed about advancements in LLM and Generative AI models and assist in integrating these into our workflows.
Familiarity with Python and fundamental software development concepts.
Ability to communicate clearly and collaborate effectively within a team environment.

As part of our internship program, you will gain early access to Manulife John Hancock’s premier early talent program, GRO, tailored to graduating students! The program designed to launch your career with the support, structure, and opportunities you need to thrive.
